resources.string: • Previous work experience: I previously worked as a Recruiter with Sellafield Energy, Lekki (An oil and gas servicing firm). Prior to that, I was a Writer/Editor with Daily Independent Newspapers, Ikeja • Course of Study : Political Science • University attended : Obafemi Awolowo University (OAU) • Positive traits: I am hardworking, friendly and lovable, positive-minded and considerate towards others • Hobbies and interests : I enjoy travelling, reading, going out, writing and talking politics • Role model and why: I admire Ibukun Awosika. She is an embodiment of conscientious work ethic, love for God and her fashion choices • Most unique thing about you: I would say the way I view the world • Other interesting information : Well, I am a twin. An identical one. (Don’t get confused, lol). Not much of a foodie, but I like to do the cooking and recipe-building • Most memorable moment/happiest moment(s): My happiest moments are the times I spend around my siblings • Favourite colour: Purple makes the world go round!
